data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.section_summary: On average, 57 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, help every believer in Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Lord, make the 58,231 believers in Hainan Tibetan to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 709,370 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Yonzhi people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Hainan Tibetan.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Hainan Tibetan, Qinghai, China to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Hainan Tibetan. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.
